mapper.select: SELECT B.MBER_ID, B.LC_CRDNT_X AS LON, B.LC_CRDNT_Y AS LAT, B.CNTER_CD , CONCAT(C.MBER_NM, '(', IFNULL(CONVERT(AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(C.MBTLNUM), 'raison') using EUCKR), ' '), ')') AS MBER_NAME , D.CNTER_NM , (SELECT CD_VALUE_DE FROM CMMN_CD_VALUE_INFO WHERE CD_ID='MBER_SE_CD' AND CD_VALUE=C.MBER_SE_CD) AS MBER_SE_NM FROM ( SELECT MBER_ID , MAX(COLCT_DT) AS COLCT_DT FROM EMRGNCY_CALL_HIST WHERE COLCT_DT > DATE(now()) GROUP BY MBER_ID LIMIT 1 ) A , EMRGNCY_CALL_HIST B , MBER_INFO C , CNTER_INFO D WHERE A.MBER_ID = B.MBER_ID AND A.COLCT_DT = B.COLCT_DT AND B.MBER_ID = C.MBER_ID AND B.CNTER_CD = D.CNTER_CD AND B.CNFIRM_AT = 'N'
